title: Users voting from ballpark app will not see facebook and twitter share images
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am viewing all-star ballot on <base_url>/app/ballpark/all-star/ballot
custom_steps: WHEN I submit my ballot successfully
custom_expected: THEN I should not see the facebook or twitter share icons on the Thank You page.

title: Users voting from at-bat app will not see facebook and twitter share images
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am viewing all-star ballot on <base_url>/app/atbat/all-star/ballot
custom_steps: WHEN I submit my ballot successfully
custom_expected: THEN I should not see the facebook or twitter share icons on the Thank You page.

title: Confirm  ASB logo is present
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ASB Logo
custom_expected: Then it exists

title: Official title shows: (Sponsor Name) All-Star Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the official title
custom_expected: Then the official title shows (Sponsor Name) MLB All-Star Ballot

title: User must see Election Ballot Web Elements
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the English ballot
custom_expected: Then verify the following web elements exists: 1B, 2B, 3B SS, C, OF, DH, AVG, HR, RBI, OPS, FIRST BASE, SECOND BASE, THIRD BASE, SHORTSTOP, CATCHER, OUTFIELD, DESIGNATED HITTER

title: About the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user selects 'About the Ballot'
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the (Year) 'About the Ballot' text.

title: Unvoted daily User sees 1 entry remaining
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user select any one player
custom_expected: Then the user must see "1 entry remaining" on the page

title: User must select at least one player to submit the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot
custom_expected: Then the user must select at least one player to submit the ballot

title: User can select one player per position and up to three players for OF and submit
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is selecting players
custom_expected: Then the user can select one player per position and up to three players for OF and submit the vote

title: Users under the age of 13 will be redirected to a coppa page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user enters a date of birth for 13 year old or under
custom_steps: When the user clicks submit
custom_expected: The the usre is navigated to https://www.mlb.com/official-information/ineligible

title: Social Sharing: Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to Twitter social share on the thank you page
custom_expected: Then  Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot

title: User can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot
custom_expected: Then the user can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)

title: (ES) Display ranks for top 3 players at each position - AL and NL
Coppa Check - Verify underaged users are redirected to the Coppa Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is under the age of 13 and fills out the form's date of birth to reflect that.
custom_steps: When the user goes to the MLB All Star Ballot, vote for players and fill out the form, indicating that you are younger than 13.
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the English and Spanish version of the ineligible page: https://www.mlb.com/es/official-information/ineligible

728x90 Sponsored ad is served on Review page (Desktop)

title: ASG Ballot should load with kiosk parameter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have the Kiosk redirect URL for the ASG Ballot
 - https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/all-star/ballot?kiosk=true&venue=citi
custom_steps: WHEN I load the URL in a browser
custom_expected: THEN I should see ASG Ballot loading in the browser

title: in Kiosk mode, a user can vote as many times as he wishes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have the Kiosk redirect URL for the ASG Ballot
- https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/all-star/ballot?kiosk=true&venue=citi
custom_steps:
WHEN I load the page in my browser
AND I make some selections 
AND I fill out my submission form
AND I submit my vote
custom_expected:
THEN I should see my vote being submitted
AND I should see the ballot page reloading || OR I should be redirected to <URL>

title: in Kiosk mode, there will be no user related cookies stored
An underage user will not be allowed to participate in the Ballot
After each vote, the page should refresh and redirect to the ballot page
Kiosk mode will support English & Spanish
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am the all-star ballot voting page in Spanish
custom_steps:
WHEN I make my selections
AND I submit my ballot in Spanish
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a THANK YOU message
AND I should be redirected to the ballot in kiosk mode

title: After a successful ballot submission at a kiosk, a user will not see share image, sponsor information request, login/signup option, asg_alert section or Review & Submit header
custom_preconds: Given a user is on the All-Star Ballot at a kiosk
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits a ballot successfully
custom_expected:
Then the user should not see the Twitter or Facebook or any other social share option
AND the user should not see any option to connect to ballot sponsor
AND the user should not see the "Download & Share" button
AND the user should not see the "asg_login_incentive" element (MLB.TV incentive block)
AND the user should not see the "asg_alert" section (Come back tomorrow! block)
AND the user should not see the "Review & Submit" header
AND the user should not see the "Change picks" option

title: A cookie  named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration" should be set the 1st time a user submits a ballot
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg" or "vote"
custom_expected: THEN I should see a cookie named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration"

title: A cookie  named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" should be set the 1st time a user submits a ballot
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg" or "vote"
custom_expected: THEN I should see a cookie named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1"

title: "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration" should contain the expiration time calculated by taking the 1st time of vote + the number of hours from Contentful (can be minutes)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 24 hours for Phase I ballot
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see the expiration time for "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration" as 24h added to the voting time

title: "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" should contain the number of time a user voted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 24 hours for Phase I ballot
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" value to be 1

title: A user can vote a maximum of "5" times in Phase I
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND I have already voted 2 times for Phase I
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit my vote for the 3rd time (with or without editing picks)
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" value updating to "3"

title: A user's voting cookie should be reset after the "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration" time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 2minutes for Phase I ballot
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I wait for the 3 minutes
custom_expected: THEN I should see the cookies clearing out after 2 minutes

title: A user's voting count cookie should be reset after "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 2minutes for Phase I ballot
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the cookies clearing out after 2 minutes
AND the cookie should reappear after I submit my submission again

title: A user cannot vote more than "5" times within the "voteCookieExpirationHours" limit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 24 hours for Phase I ballot
custom_steps: WHEN I submit my vote for the 5th time
custom_expected: THEN I should not see an option to see submit my vote again

title: A user who did not vote more than once but reaches "voteCookieExpirationHours" or cookie expiration time, the user should get new "5" votes for the next day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND the expiration value is set to 5 minutes for Phase I ballot
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
AND I wait for 6 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the voting cookies should be reset
AND I should be able to vote additional "5" more times

title: A cookie  named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" should be increased with each vote submission - up to 5
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 5th time
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see any option to vote again
AND I should see the "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" value is set to 5

title: A non-logged-in user will see an option to create an account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND I am _not_ logged into my mlb account
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
custom_expected: THEN I should see an option to sign up for an account

title: A logged-in user will not have an option to create an account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase I
AND I logged into my MLB account
custom_steps:
WHEN I navigate to the ballot page
AND I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I leave the email address field with the email address associated with my account
AND I fill in the form with other required information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I attempt to login with my credentials
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see an option to create an account
AND I should see the Vote Again option

title: A user's cookie will be set to expire at midnight of local time
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot page
custom_steps:
WHEN I make my selections for Phase I
AND I fill out the submission form 
AND I submit my ballot for the 1st time
AND I check the cookie from a browser's Application--> Cookie section (Storage --> Cookie in Safari)
AND I filter the cookies by "vote" or "asg"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see 2 cookies set for asg-ballot
AND I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1" 
AND I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration"
AND the "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-1-expiration" will be set to 11:59:59 in my local time

# NOTE: the time is set in UTC, so you may need to convert the time to your local time depending on where you are testing from.

title: Pre-mode enabled in ASG Ballot config in Contentful
With forceOn=true parameter value, the ballot will load in EN
With forceOn=true parameter value, the ballot will load in ES
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can submit a ballot in ES
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can submit a ballot in EN
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can share the ballot in FB in ES
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can share the ballot in FB in EN
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can share the ballot in Twitter in ES
With forceOn=true parameter value, a user can share the ballot in Twitter in EN
Phase II polls page will be live in ES
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am visiting the polls page in Spanish
[beta](https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/all-star/ballot/polls)
[prod](https://www.mlb.com/es/all-star/ballot/polls)
custom_expected: THEN I should see the polls page launching

title: Phase II polls page will be live in EN
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am visiting the polls page in English
[beta](https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/all-star/ballot/polls)
[prod](https://www.mlb.com/all-star/ballot/polls)
custom_expected: THEN I should see the polls page launching in English

title: The title of the polls page will be "<current_year> MLB All-Star Ballot Poll | MLB.com" for EN page
The title of the polls page will be "<current_year> MLB All-Star Ballot Poll | Lasmayores.com" for ES page
EN polls page will have a "Vote Now" button
Clicking on the "Vote Now" button on EN polls page will have direct the user to all-star/ballot page
Clicking on the "Vota ahora" button on ES polls page will have direct the user to /es/all-star/ballot page
ES polls page will have a "Vota Ahora" button
A cookie  named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2-expiration" should be set the 1st time a user submits a ballot
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see a cookie named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2-expiration"

title: A cookie  named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2" should be set the 1st time a user submits a ballot
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see a cookie named "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2"

title: "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2-expiration" should contain the expiration time calculated by taking the 1st time of vote + the number of hours from Contentful (can be minutes)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
AND the _voteCookieExpirationHours_ expiration time is set to 24 hours
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2-expiration" with expiration time at midnight of local time
AND I should see the cookie value in GMT time format
 # NOTE: the cookie time format may differ from browser to browser; i.e. in Safari, you might see it in human readable standard local time and in Chrome you might see UTC time in ISO format

title: "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2" should contain the number of time a user voted
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected: THEN I should see "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2" cookie value to be `1`

title: A user can vote a maximum of "1" time in Phase II
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see an option to vote again
AND I should be able to vote again after _voteCookieExpirationHours_ expired
# NOTE: voteCookieExpirationHours value is set to 24 hours in Contentful

title: A user's voting cookie should be reset after the "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2-expiration" time
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"

title: A user's voting count cookie should be reset after "asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
AND the voteCookieExpirationHours expiration time is set to midnight
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a  _asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2_ cookie is set to expire at midnight of user's local time
AND 1 minute passed midnight, I should see the cookie removed from browser Cookies

title: A user cannot vote more than "1" time within the "voteCookieExpirationHours" limit for Phase II
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot voting page for Phase II
AND the voteCookieExpirationHours expiration time is set to midnight
custom_steps:
WHEN I make some or all selections for the ballot
AND I review the my selections
AND I fill in the form with my information
AND I submit the form for the 1st time
AND I inspect the ballot page to view the page related cookies
AND I filter the cookies with "asg"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a  _asg-ballot-vote-count-phase-2_ cookie is set to expire at midnight of user's local time
AND I should not be allowed to vote more than once
NOTE: deleting cookie manually will produce different results & won't be considered as a bug.

title: Social Sharing: Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to Twitter social share on the thank you page
custom_expected: Then  Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot

title: User can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot
custom_expected: Then the user can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)

title: Coppa Check - Verify underaged users are redirected to the Coppa Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is under the age of 13 and fills out the form's date of birth to reflect that.
custom_steps: When the user goes to the MLB All Star Ballot, vote for players and fill out the form, indicating that you are younger than 13.
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the English and Spanish version of the ineligible page: https://www.mlb.com/es/official-information/ineligible

title: Verify Hero Image
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_expected: THEN I should see a hero image on top of the page

title: Players can be sorted by Name A-Z
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on "A-Z" tab in the sorting options tab
custom_expected: THEN I should see the players sorted by their last names

title: Players can be sorted by Average
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on "AVG" tab in the sorting options tab
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the player with highest AVG first for each position
AND I should see the players are being sorted in descending order for each position

title: Players can be sorted by HR
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on "HR" tab in the sorting options tab
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the player with highest HR first for each position
AND I should see the players are being sorted in descending order for each position

title: Players can be sorted by RBI
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on "RBI" tab in the sorting options tab
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the player with highest RBI first for each position
AND I should see the players are being sorted in descending order for each position

title: Players can be sorted by OPS
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on "OPS" tab in the sorting options tab
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the player with highest OPS first for each position
AND I should see the players are being sorted in descending order for each positiong

title: Sorting by any item/category will apply to ALL players in all positions
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I click on any sorting tab option from the sorting options
custom_expected: THEN I should see the players are being sorted in descending order for each position

title: Sorting by Name or any other field is applicable to Write-in Players also
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the Write-in option for 1st base
AND I select a player OR search for Carlos Perez 
AND I select him from the A's team
AND I sort by AVG
custom_expected: THEN I should see Carlos Perez sorting according to the AVG

title: When a sorting value is tapped/clicked, it will be highlighted with ${color} color.  [The color may vary from year to year]
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the all-start ballot page
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on A-Z
custom_expected: THEN I should see A-Z is highlighted with blue color [background color: #0C2C56]

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see AVG is highlighted with blue color [background color: #0C2C56]
THEN I should see HR is highlighted with blue color [background color: #0C2C56]
THEN I should see RBI is highlighted with blue color [background color: #0C2C56]
THEN I should see OPS is highlighted with blue color [background color: #0C2C56]

title: A position may be filled with a top vote getter
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am the phase II of ballot testing page
custom_steps: WHEN I look into some position players section
custom_expected:
THEN I may see some players are preselected
AND I should not be able to select them

title: Top vote getter position will appear on review page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on Phase II of ASG ballot page
AND I see Aaron Judge and Bryce Harper as top vote getter [could be any other player]
custom_steps:
WHEN I make my selections for other positions
AND I submit my picks on the first page
AND I am on the review page
custom_expected: THEN I should see Aaron Judge and Bryce Harper on my picks

title: Confirm  ASB logo is present
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ASB Logo
custom_expected: Then it exists

title: Official title shows: (Sponsor Name) All-Star Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the official title
custom_expected: Then the official title shows (Sponsor Name) MLB All-Star Ballot

title: User must see Election Ballot Web Elements
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the English ballot
custom_expected: Then verify the following web elements exists: 1B, 2B, 3B SS, C, OF, DH, AVG, HR, RBI, OPS, FIRST BASE, SECOND BASE, THIRD BASE, SHORTSTOP, CATCHER, OUTFIELD, DESIGNATED HITTER

title: About the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user selects 'About the Ballot'
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the (Year) 'About the Ballot' text.

title: Unvoted daily User sees 1 entry remaining
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user select any one player
custom_expected: Then the user must see "1 entry remaining" on the page

title: User must select at least one player to submit the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot
custom_expected: Then the user must select at least one player to submit the ballot

title: User can select one player per position and up to three players for OF and submit
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is selecting players
custom_expected: Then the user can select one player per position and up to three players for OF and submit the vote

title: Users under the age of 13 will be redirected to a coppa page
custom_preconds: GIVEN user enters a date of birth for 13 year old or under
custom_steps: When the user clicks submit
custom_expected: The the usre is navigated to https://www.mlb.com/official-information/ineligible

title: Social Sharing: Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to Twitter social share on the thank you page
custom_expected: Then  Twitter will share text + a link back to the Ballot

custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ENG ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user has successfully submitted a ballot
custom_expected: Then the user can share their ballot selections via social media (Facebook)

title: [Web] The color contrast of the star in the foreground and the background should be at least 3:1
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the all-star ballot site
AND I have access to Contrast Checker tool
 - https://superhighfives.com/pika for macos or use Chrome DevTools
custom_steps:
WHEN I inspect the foreground star image
AND I inspect the background image
custom_expected: THEN I should see the ratio to be at least 3:1

title: [all] a11y tools will announce player name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the ballot page
AND I am using a assistive technology in my device
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll/swipe down to a player
custom_expected: THEN I will hear the assistive tech announce the player name

title: [all] a11y tools will announce player stats
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the ballot page
AND I am using a assistive technology in my device
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll/swipe down to a player
custom_expected:
THEN I will hear the assistive tech announce the player STATS
AND I will hear the assistive tech announce the number of homeruns the players has hit this season
AND I will hear the assistive tech announce the player's Average for the season
AND I will hear the assistive tech announce the number of run batted in for the season
AND I will hear the assistive tech announce the OPS for the season

title: [all] a11y tools will announce player can be selected by tapping via OS functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the ballot page
AND I am using a assistive technology in my device
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll/swipe down to a player
custom_expected: THEN I will hear the assistive tech announce the player can be selected via OS associated operation, tapping on hand-held device, pressing ENTER in a computer etc.

title: [all] a11y tools will announce player can be selected by pressing ENTER on Mac/Windows OS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the ballot page
AND I am using a assistive technology in my device
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll/swipe down to a player
custom_expected: THEN I will hear the assistive tech announce that pressing ENTER in a computer to select the player

title: [all] players will have associated alt text in order to announce the content and the purpose of the image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the ballot page 
AND I am using a assistive technology in my device
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll/swipe down to a player
custom_expected: THEN the player name will be announced

title: [all] a11y will announce the write-in player option for each section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the all-star ballot on a webpage
AND I have a11y feature enabled on my device
custom_steps: WHEN I go swipe down to a write-in player field for 1B
custom_expected: THEN I should hear the a11y tool announcing "Write-in player AL First Base, Button"

title: [all] a11y will recognize that there is only 1 option to select from Outfield write-in position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the all-star ballot on a webpage
AND I have a11y feature enabled on my device
custom_steps: WHEN I go swipe down to a write-in player field for Outfielders
custom_expected: THEN I should hear the a11y tool announcing "Write-in player AL Designated Hitter, Button"

title: [iOS] Users voting from at-bat app will not see facebook and twitter share images
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am using the at-bat MLB app on an iOS device
custom_steps:
WHEN I vote for players
AND I submit my ballot successfully
custom_expected: THEN I should not see any facebbok or twitter link on the Thank You page

title: [Android] Users voting from at-bat app will not see facebook and twitter share images
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am using the at-bat MLB app on an Android device
custom_steps:
WHEN I vote for players
AND I submit my ballot successfully
custom_expected: THEN I should not see any facebook or twitter link on the Thank You page
